cardDetail.title: Espresso
cardDetail.description: A rich and bold shot of coffee, perfect for those who love intense flavors and a quick pick-me-up.

cardDetail.title: Latte
cardDetail.description: A creamy blend of espresso and steamed milk, topped with a layer of velvety foam.

cardDetail.title: Cappuccino
cardDetail.description: A perfect balance of espresso, steamed milk, and foam, sprinkled with a dash of cocoa powder.

cardDetail.title: Americano
cardDetail.description: A smooth, diluted espresso offering a milder coffee flavor with a robust aroma.

cardDetail.title: Mocha
cardDetail.description: A delightful fusion of espresso, chocolate, and steamed milk, topped with whipped cream.

cardDetail.title: Cold Brew
cardDetail.description: A refreshing and smooth coffee brewed slowly with cold water, served over ice.

cardDetail.title: Caprese Salad
cardDetail.description: A delightful combination of ripe tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and basil, drizzled with balsamic glaze for a fresh and vibrant starter.

cardDetail.title: Garlic Bread
cardDetail.description: Crispy slices of bread coated with garlic butter and herbs, baked to golden perfection and served warm.

cardDetail.title: Chocolate Lava Cake
cardDetail.description: An indulgent dessert with a gooey molten chocolate center, served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

cardDetail.title: Caesar Salad
cardDetail.description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with creamy Caesar dressing, Parmesan cheese, and crunchy croutons.

cardDetail.title: Stuffed Mushrooms
cardDetail.description: Mushrooms filled with a savory blend of cheese, herbs, and breadcrumbs, baked until golden and delicious.

cardDetail.title: Tiramisu
cardDetail.description: A classic Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers, mascarpone cream, and a dusting of cocoa powder.

cardDetail.title: Garden Fresh Pizza
cardDetail.description: A thin-crust pizza topped with a medley of fresh vegetables, mozzarella, and a zesty tomato sauce.

cardDetail.title: Spinach Artichoke Dip
cardDetail.description: A creamy and cheesy dip with spinach and artichokes, served with crispy pita chips.

cardDetail.title: Berry Cheesecake
cardDetail.description: A rich and creamy cheesecake topped with a mix of fresh berries and a hint of mint.

testimonailsData.name: Antony Clifton
testimonailsData.review: Cupporia offers the best coffee in town! The cozy atmosphere and the expertly brewed cups make it my go-to place for a perfect coffee experience.

testimonailsData.name: Maria Sanchez
testimonailsData.review: I was disappointed with my visit to Cupporia. The coffee didn’t meet my expectations, and the service felt slow. Not the best experience for me.

testimonailsData.name: Tamika Jackson
testimonailsData.review: Cupporia has a great vibe and serves good coffee. The staff is friendly, and I love the atmosphere. It’s just a bit crowded at times, but definitely worth a visit.

testimonailsData.name: Brandon Ming
testimonailsData.review: I really enjoy my visits to Cupporia. The coffee is rich and flavorful, and the space is perfect for relaxing. Just wish it wasn’t so busy on weekends!

testimonailsData.name: Kristina Roberts
testimonailsData.review: Cupporia is fine, but it didn’t live up to the hype. The coffee was average, and I expected a bit more from the place based on its reputation.

testimonailsData.name: Marisa Daniels
testimonailsData.review: I absolutely love Cupporia! The coffee is always top-notch, and the staff is incredibly welcoming. A perfect spot to enjoy a delicious cup of coffee.
